title: How To Repair a Punctured Lawn Tractor Tyre | Tubeless Tire Repair

tasks.task: Repair a punctured lawn tractor tire.
subtasks: Jack up the lawn tractor and remove the wheel.
Pump up the tire to detect the leak.
Apply soapy solution to locate the leak.
Mark the leak location and clean the puncture hole.
Insert a plug into the hole using a specialized tool.
Trim excess plug material and check for leaks.
Reinstall the wheel and hubcap with a small amount of grease.
